**/announcement** - Show the latest announcement from the creator.
**/balance** - View balance.
**/beg** - Beg to get a few coins.
**/beta** - Join Morex Beta to test new features early.
**/bug report** - Report bugs to the developer.
**/buy** - Buy items from the shop using coins.
**/changelog** - Display most important changes in different versions.
**/craft** - Craft the items.
**/credits** - Special thanks to all people that are listed in this command.
**/custommobs create** - Create your own custom mob.
**/custommobs view** - Show user's Custom mobs
**/deposit** - Deposit coins into the bank.
**/dig** - Go dig up ores and treasures.
**/equipment bundle equip** - Move items from inventory to bundle.
**/equipment bundle unequip** - Move items from bundle to inventory.
**/equipment view** - View your equipment.
**/equipment weapon equip** - Equip weapons on different slots.
**/equipment weapon unequip** - Unequip weapon from selected slot.
**/event** - Display informations about current event.
**/fight** - Fight with different users using your weapons.
**/give coins** - Give coins to the other person.
**/give item** - Give items to the other person.
**/help** - Show all available commands.
**/hunt** - Grab your weapon and go hunt some enemies.
**/inventory** - View user's inventory.
**/item** - View informations about an item.
**/leaderboards** - View top 10 users in various categories.
**/ping** - Pong!
**/profile** - Shows user's profile
**/quests** - Show your current quests.
**/rate** - Rate the bot.
**/recipe** - View recipes for certain items.
**/redeem** - Type codes to get free items.
**/rob** - Try to rob someone to earn some coins.
**/search** - Search various places to get coins and items.
**/sell** - Sell your items to earn coins.
**/set default dig** - Set the default location for /dig.
**/set default hunt** - Set the default location for /hunt.
**/set default search** - Set the default location for /search.
**/settings** - Manage your settings.
**/shop** - Displays a shop with every item you can buy.
**/skills change** - Raise certain Skill level.
**/skills view** - Show user's skills.
**/slots** - Play at slots machine to win coins.
**/smelt** - Smelt items to get smelted items.
**/trade for_coins** - Trade coins for items and vice versa.
**/trade for_item** - Trade your items for other user's items.
**/use** - Use items.
**/withdraw** - Withdraw coins from the bank.
